mapper.select: SELECT t.ID, t.TITLE, t.STATUS_TASK, t.CREATED_DATE, t.START_DATE, t.DUE_DATE, t.CLOSE_DATE FROM TASK t INNER JOIN USER u ON t.USER_ID = u.ID WHERE t.USER_ID = #{userId} AND t.STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND ( (t.START_DATE IS NULL AND ((DATE_FORMAT(t.CREATED_DATE, '%Y-%m') >= #{prevMonth} AND DATE_FORMAT(t.CREATED_DATE, '%Y-%m') <= #{nextMonth}) OR (DATE_FORMAT(t.DUE_DATE, '%Y-%m') >= #{prevMonth} AND DATE_FORMAT(t.DUE_DATE, '%Y-%m') <= #{nextMonth})) ) OR (t.START_DATE IS NOT NULL AND (( DATE_FORMAT( CASE WHEN t.STATUS_TASK != 'CLOSED' THEN t.DUE_DATE WHEN t.STATUS_TASK = 'CLOSED' THEN t.CLOSE_DATE END, '%Y-%m') >= #{prevMonth} AND DATE_FORMAT( CASE WHEN t.STATUS_TASK != 'CLOSED' THEN t.DUE_DATE WHEN t.STATUS_TASK = 'CLOSED' THEN t.CLOSE_DATE END, '%Y-%m') <= #{nextMonth}) OR (DATE_FORMAT(t.START_DATE, '%Y-%m') >= #{prevMonth} AND DATE_FORMAT(t.START_DATE, '%Y-%m') <= #{nextMonth}) )) );
